name: transcription
description: Live transcription overlay for OBS/VMix with Gladia API

scripts.build:all: bun run build:win && bun run build:linux && bun run build:linux-arm && bun run build:mac && bun run build:mac-arm && bun run build:mac-universal && bun run checksums
scripts.build:mac-universal: bun run build:mac && bun run build:mac-arm && lipo -create dist/transcription-mac-x64 dist/transcription-mac-arm64 -output dist/transcription-mac-universal
scripts.checksums: cd dist && shasum -a 256 transcription-* > checksums.txt && cat checksums.txt

author: Hugo
